title:
Boundedness results for families of non-canonically polarized projective
  varieties
abstract:
We prove that, over a smooth quasi-projective curve, the set of
non-isotrivial, smooth and projective families of polarized varieties with a
fixed Hilbert polynomial and semi-ample canonical bundle is bounded. This
extends the boundedness results of Arakelov, Parshin, and Kov\'acs--Lieblich
beyond the canonically polarized case.
